1400.name: Spellbook: Surrender To Fire
1400.description: Spellbook needed to learn Surrenders To Fire. Used by Human Wizards. Required level: 25

1401.name: Spellbook: Acumen
1401.description: Spellbook needed to learn Acumen. Used by Clerics. Required level: 20

1402.name: Spellbook: Agility
1402.description: Spellbook needed to learn Agility. Used by Elven Oracles. Required level: 25

1403.name: Spellbook: Summon Kat the Cat
1403.description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Kat the Cat. Used by Human Wizards. Required level: 20

1404.name: Spellbook: Servitor Recharge
1404.description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Recharge. Used by Human Wizards, Elven Wizards, and Dark Wizards. Required level: 25

1405.name: Spellbook: Servitor Heal
1405.description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Heal. Used by Human Wizards, Elven Wizards, and Dark Wizards. Required level: 20

1406.name: Spellbook: Servitor Wind Walk
1406.description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Wind Walk. Used by Human Wizards. Required level: 35

1407.name: Spellbook: Servitor Magic Boost
1407.description: Spellbook needed to learn Bright Servitor. Used by Elven Wizards. Required level: 35

1408.name: Spellbook: Mighty Servitor
1408.description: Spellbook needed to learn Mighty Servitor. Used by Dark Wizards. Required level: 35

1409.name: Spellbook: Slow
1409.description: Spellbook needed to learn Slow. Used by Human Wizards and Dark Wizards. Required level: 35

1410.name: Spellbook: Poisonous Cloud
1410.description: Spellbook needed to learn Poisonous Cloud. Used by Human Wizards and Dark Wizards. Required level: 25

1411.name: Spellbook: Aura Burn
1411.description: Spellbook needed to learn Aura Burn. Used by Wizards, Elven Wizards and Dark Wizards. Required level: 20

1412.name: Spellbook: Resist Aqua
1412.description: Spellbook needed to learn Resist Aqua. Used by Elven Wizards and Prophets. Required level: Elven Wizard - 25, Prophet - 58

1413.name: Spellbook: Resist Wind
1413.description: Spellbook needed to learn Resist Wind. Used by Shillien Oracles and Prophets. Required level: Shillien Oracle - 35, Prophet - 58

1414.name: Spellbook: Resist Fire
1414.description: Spellbook needed to learn Resist Fire. Used by Clerics. Required level: 30

1415.name: Spellbook: Dryad Root
1415.description: Spellbook needed to learn Dryard Root. Used by Clerics, Oracles and Shillien Oracles. Required level: 25

1416.name: Spellbook: Curse of Chaos
1416.description: Spellbook needed to learn Curse of Chaos. Used by Human Wizards and Dark Wizards. Required level: 35

1417.name: Spellbook: Surrender To Earth
1417.description: Spellbook needed to learn Surrender To Earth. Used by Elven Wizards. Required level: 35

1418.name: Spellbook: Surrender To Poison
1418.description: Spellbook needed to learn Surrender To Poison. Used by Dark Wizards. Required level: 25

1419.name: Blood Mark
1419.description: An item needed to upgrade a clan to level three.

1420.name: Ingredient List
1420.description: A list of cooking ingredients from Jonas. Mandragora essence. Honey. Dionian potato. Marsh moss. Floating eye meat.

1421.name: Sonia's Botany Book
1421.description: A picture that shows what a mandragora looks like. You need this to get mandragora roots.

1422.name: Red Mandragora Root
1422.description: Red mandragora root. Collect these to take them to Trader Sonia.

1423.name: White Mandragora Root
1423.description: Rare white mandragora root. Collect these to take them to Trader Sonia.

1424.name: Red Mandragora Sap
1424.description: Red mandragora sap. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

1425.name: White Mandragora Sap
1425.description: Transparent mandragora sap. One of the ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

1426.name: Jacob's Insect Book
1426.description: A diagram that depicts the drawing of a bee. You must possess this in order to obtain nectar and royal jelly from the bloody bee or the stinger wasp.

1427.name: Nectar
1427.description: Honey water taken from a giant bee. Collect 20 of these to take them to Guard Jacob.

1428.name: Royal Jelly
1428.description: A rare ingredient that can be taken only from newborn working bees. Collect these and take them to Guard Jacob.

1429.name: Honey
1429.description: Honey made from the nectar you collected from bees. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

1430.name: Golden Honey
1430.description: Golden honey made from the nectar and the royal jelly you collected from bees. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

1431.name: Pano's Contract
1431.description: A contract Grocer Pano gave you. It says, if you kill Hobgoblins and bring 30 pieces of proof, he will give you potatoes as a reward.

1432.name: Hobgoblin Amulet
1432.description: An amulet made of a feather that Hobgoblins carry on their bodies. Collect 30 of these and take them to Grocer Pano.

1433.name: Dionian Potato
1433.description: The highest-quality potatoes grown in the rich soil of southern Dion. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

1434.name: Glyvka's Botany Book
1434.description: A picture that explains how to collect moss. You need this to collect marsh moss from grey ants or crimson ants.

1435.name: Green Marsh Moss
1435.description: Green marsh moss is sometimes used in cooking. Collect this and take it to Priestess Glyvka.

1436.name: Brown Marsh Moss
1436.description: Rare brown marsh moss, its flavors are superior to the green ones. Collect this and take it to Priestess Glyvka.

1437.name: Green Moss Bundle
1437.description: A bundle of well-cared-for moss, collected from a marshy place for cooking. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

1438.name: Brown Moss Bundle
1438.description: A bundle of well-cared-for moss, collected from a marshy place for cooking. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

1439.name: Rollant's Creature Book
1439.description: A picture that shows what a monster eye looks like. You need this to collect the right monster eye searcher or the monster eye gazer.

1440.name: Body of Monster Eye
1440.description: Severed flesh of the dead body of monster eye. Take this to Magister Rollant.

1441.name: Monster Eye Meat
1441.description: The dead body of a monster eye, ready to cook. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

1442.name: Jonas's 1st Steak Dish
1442.description: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

1443.name: Jonas's 2nd Steak Dish
1443.description: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

1444.name: Jonas's 3rd Steak Dish
1444.description: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

1445.name: Jonas's 4th Steak Dish
1445.description: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

1446.name: Jonas's 5th Steak Dish
1446.description: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

1447.name: Mirien's Review
1447.description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

1448.name: Mirien's Review
1448.description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

1449.name: Mirien's Review
1449.description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

1450.name: Mirien's Review
1450.description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

1451.name: Mirien's Review
1451.description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

1452.name: Harpy Feather
1452.description: A feather taken from a harpy. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton.

1453.name: Medusa Venom
1453.description: Poison extracted from the snake hair of a medusa. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton.

1454.name: Wyrm's Tooth
1454.description: A sharp fang of a Wyrm. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton.

1455.name: Jonas's Salad Recipe
1455.description: Jonas's recipe for making marsh moss salad.

1456.name: Jonas's Sauce Recipe
1456.description: Jonas's recipe for making mandragora sauce.

1457.name: Jonas's Steak Recipe
1457.description: Jonas's recipe for making monster eye meat steak.

1458.name: Crystal (D-Grade)
1458.description: A crystal of D-Grade. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo.

1459.name: Crystal (C-Grade)
1459.description: A crystal of C-Grade. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo.

1460.name: Crystal (B-Grade)
1460.description: A crystal of B-Grade. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo.

1461.name: Crystal (A-Grade)
1461.description: A crystal of A-Grade. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo.

1462.name: Crystal (S-Grade)
1462.description: A crystal of S-Grade. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo.

1463.name: Soulshot (D-Grade)
1463.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a D-grade weapon. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo. Soulshot: D-Grade

1464.name: Soulshot (C-Grade)
1464.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a C-grade weapon. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo. Soulshot: C-Grade

1465.name: Soulshot (B-Grade)
1465.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a B-grade weapon. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo. Soulshot: B-Grade

1466.name: Soulshot (A-Grade)
1466.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with an A-grade weapon. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo. Soulshot: A-Grade

1467.name: Soulshot (S-Grade)
1467.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with an S-grade weapon. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo. Soulshot: S-Grade

1468.name: Gludin Panacen
1468.description: A medicated herb from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo.

1469.name: Gludin Vermouth
1469.description: Medicated wine from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo.

1470.name: Artemeter
1470.description: A medicated herb from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo.

1473.name: Kasha Wolf Fang
1473.description: A fang that is obtained by killing a kasha wolf. Collect fifty and take these to Praetorian Rukain.

1474.name: Grave Robber's Head
1474.description: The head of goblin robbers, who damaged the graves of Orc ancestors. Collect 50 to take to Seer Livina.

1475.name: Black Soulstone
1475.description: A black soulstone pulled out of the heart of a rakeclaw imp. Collect these to take to Atuba Chief Varkees.

1476.name: Red Soulstone
1476.description: A red soulstone pulled out of the heart of a rakeclaw imp. Collect these to take to Atuba Chief Varkees.

1477.name: Maraku Werewolf Head
1477.description: The head of a Maraku werewolf that has been cut off after they were defeated. Collect 40 of these and take them to Prefect Brukurse.

1478.name: Darkwing Bat Fang
1478.description: A fang of a darkwing bat. Collect 70 of these and take them to Neruga Chief Tantus.

1479.name: Varangka's Parasite
1479.description: An evil parasite that summons Varangka's trackers.

1480.name: Kasha Parasite
1480.description: A parasite-type evil spirit that comes out of the gray bear polluted by kasha's evil spirit. This is the key calling forth the kasha totem spirit.

1481.name: Kasha Crystal
1481.description: A crystal obtained by killing the gray bear totem polluted by kasha's evil spirit. Take this to Seer Tanapi.

1482.name: Black Wolf Pelt
1482.description: Pelt of a black wolf. Collect 40 to take to Maryse Redbonnet.

1483.name: Goblin Necklace
1483.description: A necklace obtained by killing a low-level goblin. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

1484.name: Goblin Pendant
1484.description: A necklace obtained by killing a high-level goblin. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

1485.name: Goblin Lord Pendant
1485.description: A necklace obtained by killing the goblin lord. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

1486.name: Suspicious Memo
1486.description: A suspicious memo obtained by killing a goblin brigand leader. Take this to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

1487.name: Suspicious Contract
1487.description: A suspicious contract completed by collecting suspicious memos. This contract reveals that the Silver Scale Guild requested the brigands to attack the freight wagons.

1488.name: Chrysolite Ore
1488.description: Chrysolite Ore received from defeating Utuku Orcs. Collect these and take them to Filaur of the Gray Pillar.

1489.name: Torn Map Fragment
1489.description: A part of the map that reveals the hidden vein of Chrysolite. Collect 4 of these pieces to complete the map.

1490.name: Hidden Ore Map
1490.description: A map that reveals a hidden vein of Chrysolite. Take this to Filaur of the Gray Pillar.

1491.name: Bat Fang
1491.description: A fang taken by killing a blade bat or a barb bat. Collect 100 and take them to Bronze Key's Keef

1492.name: Floating Stone
1492.description: A stone that floats on water. Obtain it from a magical weaver. Collect 50 and take them to Black Anvil's Arin.

1493.name: Tarantula Spider Silk
1493.description: The spider silk that makes when making their nests. Collect these and take them to Trader Mion.

1494.name: Tarantula Spinnerette
1494.description: A pocket shaped organ that makes spider silk. Take this to Defender Nathan.

1495.name: Giant Spider's Skin
1495.description: The husk of a giant spider that you peel off. Collect them and take them to Edmond.

1496.name: Voucher of Flame
1496.description: This token represents the qualification of Orc fighters. Take this and go to the Flame Guardian Vulkus.

1497.name: Necklace of Flame
1497.description: The necklace of flame given by Vulkus. Hand this to Kakai, the Lord of Flame, king of the Orcs.

1498.name: License of Miner
1498.description: A license given to Dwarves to allow them to mine. Take this and go to Foreman Laferon.

1499.name: Laferon's Recommendation
1499.description: The recommendation of Foreman Laferon. Take this and go to First Elder Lockirin.
